role_description: An Ansible role that installs aria2, as well as AriaNg (a web interface for aria2), on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [aria2](https://aria2.github.io/) is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. [AriaNg](http://ariang.mayswind.net/) is a modern web frontend that makes working with aria2 easier.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs aria2, as well as AriaNg (a web interface for aria2), on nearly any platform.
